Entries.SeedShop_Pierre_NotWinter: Hi there! Welcome to the Sweet Potato Mart!
Entries.SeedShop_Pierre_Raining: It's a good day to shop!

Entries.Introduction: Hello there! I'm Gil Harmon, owner of the Sweet Potato Mart..#$b#Stop by if you're ever looking for seeds, I'm always home#$e#I'm also very good at advertising, if you need that sort of thing!
Entries.Resort: I'm losing a lot of money being away from the shop...$s#$b#But I have to take advantage of house arrest leave when I can!
Entries.Resort_Shore: When I'm free for good, I want to live here.
Entries.Resort_Chair: Eh, let the kids play in the sun. I'll just sit in this chair.
Entries.Resort_Bar: Drink after drink... Bobby must be making a killing!
Entries.cc_Complete: This is a dream-come-true! You can't begin to imagine how much stress JojaMart was causing me.#$e#For a small town like this, one store is enough!
Entries.joja_Begin: This is a sad day for Pelican Town... The stronger Joja becomes, the closer I move toward bankruptcy. I might have to sell the shop soon...$s
Entries.MovieInvitation: Hey, that's a great idea... I will have to appeal for leave first. I can't go back to jail
Entries.Mon: Do you need help with something? Don't fear because Gil Harmon is here!
Entries.Mon_inlaw_Abigail: Hello, er... my son?$s^Hello, er... daughter?$s
Entries.Mon4: Hi, @. Need help from the super techster? Oh this ankle ‘bracelet'? Don't you worry about that…
Entries.Mon4_inlaw_Abigail: Hi, @. How's Abigail doing? The shop hasn't been the same without her...
Entries.Tue: If you need my tech help just let me know! I'm a super techster!.#$e#Wait… should I put that on a t-shirt?$h
Entries.Tue6: Jil was very kind to let me stay here after the divorce…$h
Entries.Wed: It's my day off today.#$e#If only I wasn't on house arrest…$s
Entries.Wed4: I have a new very exciting thing to sell you! The guy I bought it from said it would be the next big thing! Wait, where are you going?.$s
Entries.Thu: I'm happy to buy any produce off you.#$b#I'll give you a fair price - that's a Gil Guarantee!
Entries.Thu2: I really do appreciate your business, Mr. @. It's been hard for business since I was put on house arrest^I really do appreciate your business, Ms. @.It's been hard for business since I was put on house arrest
Entries.Thu8: #$1 pierre2#Does Abigail look anything like me? Don't tell my ex-wife, but sometimes I wonder if I'm really the father.$k$s#$e#Don't tell my ex-wife, but I hate to cook dinner.
Entries.Fri: #$1 pierreJoja#Business has been slow since Joja moved into town. It's hard to compete with their selection.$k$s#$e#Hi there. Is your farm doing well?#$e#Maybe a few of my these seeds will spruce things up!
Entries.Sat: If you find any wild produce, I'll take it off your hands for a reasonable price - that's a Gil Guarantee!
Entries.Sat8: I'll tell you a secret. I'm on house arrest for tax fraud.$h#$e#Oh, you already knew?.
Entries.Sun: #$1 pierreBlue#*sigh*... I've got those behind-the-counter blues...$k$s#$e#I wish I could go for a walk, but I don't want to go back to jail.#$e#I've heard the flowers are in bloom and the air smells great...$s
Entries.Wed6: #$1 pierre1#*sigh*... No matter how well the business does, it's never enough to satisfy my desire for success. $s#$e#Someday I'm going to open a new shop in the city and make a killing.#$e#Unfortunately, I lost all my money in the divorce...$s
Entries.Thu4: Hey, @. You're my number one customer!
Entries.summer_Mon: I've got summer seeds available! You'd better stock up.
Entries.summer_Wed: I'm so glad to have a day off from work.
Entries.summer_Thu: Everyone's enjoying the weather instead of shopping... *sigh*
Entries.summer_Fri: Hi there! Are you satisfied with the quality of my summer seeds?
Entries.summer_Sat: Summer is a good time to eat a refreshing salad, don't you think? Try my new range of Salad Veggies™, order today!
Entries.summer_Sun: Ugh... It's so hot in here.
Entries.winter_Mon: You can't grow any crops during winter... so I have no seeds to offer you.#$e#It's really going to cut into our profits.
Entries.winter_Wed: #$1 pierreDin#My ex-wife and I are actually good friends$k#$e#She let me stay here after the divorce.
Entries.winter_Thu: Hello there! In the mood for a little shopping?
Entries.winter_Fri: Hello there! I'm Gil Harmon, and this is Winter Toeless Shoes! - What do you think? Do I still need to work on my sales pitch?.
Entries.winter_Sat: Is it just me or is there a cold draft in here?
Entries.winter_Sun: If I wasn't on house arrest, I would be outside right now.#$e#It would be fun to throw a snowball.
Entries.fall_Mon: Fall seeds are here! Crops don't grow in winter so this is your last shot until spring.#$b#Better go all out, huh?
Entries.fall_Thu: It's starting to get cold outside...#$b#That means more people come into the shop to warm up... hehe.
Entries.fall_Fri: #$1 pierreMEGA#My dream is to keep opening new stores until I become extremely wealthy. hehehe.$k#$e#Hi there. Is your farm still doing well?#$e#Maybe a few of my seeds will spruce things up.$h
Entries.fall_Sat: I'm happy to buy whatever you produce on the farm.#$e#Yes, I do resell it for a profit... but that's the benefit of being an established shop owner.#$e#Don't get any ideas...
Entries.fall_Sun: If I wasn't on house arrest I would be outside right now...#$e#The leaves look great and the mushrooms are sprouting.
Entries.Event_naga1: Thanks, I appreciate that. Just forget you ever saw this, okay?$h#$b#...And I'll just forget that you were snooping around in my bedroom!
Entries.Event_naga2: You would really do that to me? You're terrible.$s#$b#You shouldn't have been snooping around in my bedroom in the first place! Nosy neighbours are the worst.$3
